title: English at Work. - Eps. 13-15.
creator_credit: Mandy Smith, Karl McPhee, Diane Sundin and SBS-TV
brief_description: In “Communicating change” issues of both coping with change in the workplace and change in personal relationships are addressed. Episode 14, “Planning for your retirement” answers some of the most frequent questions asked about superannuation. And in “Resolving conflicts” the Victorian Building Industries Agreement is examined as evidence of the importance of regular contact, negotiation and consultation between employers, trade unions and employees/members.
